mongodb.name.title: Namespace
mongodb.name.description: Unique name that identifies the MongoDB replica set or cluster and all recorded offsets, and that is used as a prefix for all schemas and topics. Each distinct MongoDB installation should have a separate namespace and monitored by at most one Debezium connector.

mongodb.hosts.title: Hosts
mongodb.hosts.description: The hostname and port pairs (in the form 'host' or 'host:port') of the MongoDB server(s) in the replica set.

mongodb.user.title: User
mongodb.user.description: Database user for connecting to MongoDB, if necessary.

mongodb.password.title: Password
mongodb.password.description: Password to be used when connecting to MongoDB, if necessary.

oneOf.description: Password of the database user to be used when connecting to the database.
An opaque reference to the password.

database.include.list.title: Include Databases
database.include.list.description: A comma-separated list of regular expressions that match the database names for which changes are to be captured

database.exclude.list.title: Exclude Databases
database.exclude.list.description: A comma-separated list of regular expressions that match the database names for which changes are to be excluded

collection.include.list.title: Include Collections
collection.include.list.description: A comma-separated list of regular expressions that match the collection names for which changes are to be captured

collection.exclude.list.description: A comma-separated list of regular expressions that match the collection names for which changes are to be excluded

field.exclude.list.title: Exclude Fields
field.exclude.list.description: A comma-separated list of the fully-qualified names of fields that should be excluded from change event message values

snapshot.mode.title: Snapshot mode
snapshot.mode.description: The criteria for running a snapshot upon startup of the connector. Options include: 'initial' (the default) to specify the connector should always perform an initial sync when required; 'never' to specify the connector should never perform an initial sync

query.fetch.size.title: Query fetch size
query.fetch.size.description: The maximum number of records that should be loaded into memory while streaming.  A value of `0` uses the default JDBC fetch size.

max.batch.size.title: Change event batch size
max.batch.size.description: Maximum size of each batch of source records. Defaults to 2048.

max.queue.size.title: Change event buffer size
max.queue.size.description: Maximum size of the queue for change events read from the database log but not yet recorded or forwarded. Defaults to 8192, and should always be larger than the maximum batch size.

key.title: Kafka Message Key Format
key.description: The serialization format for the Kafka message key.

value.title: Kafka Message Value Format
value.description: The serialization format for the Kafka message value.
